metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7263 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: The mad_decoder_run() function in decoder.c in Underbit libmad through 0.15.1b allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (SIGABRT because of double free or corruption) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2017-11552.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to SUSE bz#1082025 this is an issue on mpg321 and a duplicate of CVE-2017-11552

criterions.comment: mpg321 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
